document.full_text: the united states was hoping on tuesday to question the detained three wives of osama bin laden although pakistani officials played down the possibility of any speedy access, saying no decision had been made.
document.title: u.s. hopes to question bin laden's wives
lines_and_colors: the united states was hoping on tuesday to question the detained three wives of osama bin laden although pakistani officials played down the possibility of any speedy access, saying no decision had been made.
